#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int coprime(int a,int b)
{
 int temp,l;
    l = b%a;
    if(l==0)
        return 0;
    else if(l==1)
        return 1;
    else
        return (coprime(l,a));
}

int main() {
	
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		int n,count=0,x,i;
		
		cin>>n;
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			x=coprime(i,n);
			
			if(x)
				count++;
		}
		
		cout<<(count+1)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
